title: Mount Fuji
description: Mount Fuji is a source of inspiration for many, a symbol of peace and calm, as well as a powerful volcano. As Japan's highest mountain and a designated World Heritage Site, Mount Fuji attracts many people each year. Mount Fuji provides students a look at the many aspects of this natural wonder, from its cultural significance to its ever-changing beauty. The book can also be used to teach students how to determine an author's point of view and the proper use of hyphenated compound adjectives.
